###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlHeader_GetItemImage

###Description###
Retrieves the index of an image within the image list

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiHeader.au3>
_GUICtrlHeader_GetItemImage($hWnd, $iIndex)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to control
$iIndex
	Zero based item index
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: Zero based index of the image

###Remarks###
None.

###Related###
_GUICtrlHeader_SetItemImage
